summary: Textures and meshes to make armors for all male guards a little more revealing. Sets for MysticBinary\'s and Sundracon\'s male body replacers available.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Update August 2013:[/color] I am in the process of porting this to Schlongs of Skyrim.

[b][u]Revealing Guards for Males[/u][/b]

Textures and meshes for a more revealing look on all male guards.
Supports both MysticBinary\'s and Sundracon\'s male body replacers.


[u]Note[/u]

This is an incredibly dirty hack to get this working because as soon as you delete the original body mesh, all guards
in the game will be using the same texture.

No idea if this is me not really knowing yet what I\'m doing there, or NifSkope having no clue yet about what makes this
\'one mesh - multiple textures\' thing work, or if the CK would be needed to do this the proper way. So, until
I figure out the proper way, this dirty hack will need to be enough. It works, but it\'s not pretty. (Well, it\'s pretty
in the game. Just not pretty if you have a look at it in NifSkope or such.)

[u]Requirements[/u]

[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=265]BodyHair Nude Male HD[/url] by MysticBinary

or

[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts New Vegas Male[/url] by Sundracon

[i]You need the \'Base Textures\' set and [b]only one[/b] of the Mesh Sets - depending on which Male Body Mod you are using.[/i]


[u]Installation[/u]
 
 - Download and extract the \'Base Textures\' set to the Data/ directory

 - Download and extract [b]one[/b] of the mesh sets to the Data/ directory


[u]Uninstallation[/u]

 - Delete the files from the Data/ directory


[u]Credits[/u]

[i]Sundracon Set[/i]:
AlienSlof - Meshes
Sundracon - Conversion

[i]MysticBinary Set[/i]:
MysticBinary82 - Meshes

Bethesda - Textures
aoki - Fixes
author: Lugburzum
